message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"new","sentence":"我们有新课本。","image_prompt":"In a classroom filled with soft, muted light, a group of students sits at desks, each holding a brand new textbook. One child in the foreground opens a textbook, pages crisp and untouched, with an excited look. The atmosphere conveys freshness and novelty, and the room looks slightly futuristic and hopeful, in a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle fading sunlight and subtle signs of change in the outside world visible through the classroom windows.","sentence_translation":"We have new textbooks."}
